title: What did Urgot look like before his transformation?
body: We have "human" variations of other monstrous champions, such as Ryze, Sion and Brand. What did Urgot look like before becoming a cyborg?

replies.body:
We can never get a "human" skin for Urgot, tho.

All we could get would be some official art from the time before he went to Zaun, but it is unlikely that we will get something like that, since it has no impact on the developing story at this point anymore.

I think you can kinda imagine him like a human Sion. Really tall, muscled Noxian soldier.

> [{quoted}](name=Chembaron Yamada,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=GyauTWrU,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-24T14:04:36.698+0000)
>
> We can never get a "human" skin for Urgot, tho.
> 
> All we could get would be some official art from the time before he went to Zaun, but it is unlikely that we will get something like that, since it has no impact on the developing story at this point anymore.
> 
> I think you can kinda imagine him like a human Sion. Really tall, muscled Noxian soldier.

I dont think i'd want a human skin for Urgot (unless it's legendary or even ultimate tier, in which case it'd probably be bad-ass.) An official artwork is everything i could wish for. I just want to know who he used to be, as it's very hard to tell with how he currently is. You can't even tell with certainty what his face used to look like.

If pictures of his time before Zaun exist, he would go on a raid to destroy them all.
Urgot wouldn't ever want anyone to see him in his weak state. He is all about strength.
{{sticker:sg-syndra}} 

________________

Jokes aside, like I said, how he used to look like is simply not important for his story anymore, is it?
I consider myself an Urgot main and love the champion to no end, but I don't actually think I need to know this detail either. Urgot is more about the present and your future, to suffer to become stronger.

And I prefer the lore to keep going forward for now. They have spent quite alot of time looking at Runeterra's past. Let us now see in which direction the champions are going with their future now.

I'm guessing he used to be a huge and very muscular man. The peak of Noxian strength and brutality. He probably was still bald then too. I imagine him with the build of Sion, but not quite so big. But it does seem that his current muscular arms are just the same as he had as an executioner. How else can you lift giant Noxian axes and whatever other weapons they use to execute criminals?
idk just imagine having his other arm and legs?

I'm not sure if it was ever confirmed to be Urgot, but Ekko battles a chem-thug in his Teaser "Seconds", it could be a less augmented version of him. 
Generally, the chem-thug aesthetic would fit for him, so I imagine he looks something like the other people from Zaun using chem-tech. More Zaun images [here](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/region/zaun/).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtEpp9lkfxA

they confirmed that it was just a random zaun thug
Ah ok, I must admit that I was too lazy to further research this.

He used to be Noxian, though. He's only in Zaun after being sent there to prison.
I dont understand why this topic has a downvote. Hes asking an honest question.
He'd probably look like that guy that orders 3 big macs at mcdonalds, but whiter
god i miss playing old urgot
prolly a fat pos with an axe.
